name: Pachirisu
author: Noriko Hotta
flavor_text: It’s one of the kinds of Pokémon with electric cheek pouches. It shoots charges from its tail.

poke_power.name: Self-Generation
poke_power.effect: Once during your turn, when you put Pachirisu from your hand onto your Bench, you may attach up to 2 {L} Energy cards from your hand to Pachirisu.

attacks.name: Shocking Bolt
attacks.effect: Put all Energy cards attached to Pachirisu in the Lost Zone.
